name: DeclareMedia
tag_list: directory, seo, local, online-marketing, directories, internet-marketing, search-engine-optimization, search-engine-marketing
overview:
DeclareMedia manages tens of thousands of local, online business directories.

If you own a self-storage facility in Akron, Ohio, they have a directory for that. If you’ve got a web design firm in Dallas, Texas, they’ve got a directory for that, too. If you’re a financial planner they’ve got around 70 financial planner directories for you to choose from, depending on where you’re located. They’ve got directories for realtors, restaurants, drug rehab clinics, wedding photographers, assisted living facilities, bed and breakfasts–you name it. And if you don’t see a directory that fits what you do, you can suggest they add it and they’ll probably have it up in a matter of days.

Getting a listing in one of DeclareMedia’s directories provides two benefits. First, you’ll get more traffic to your website, and more traffic means more leads, more sales, more revenue, more profits. Second, you’ll get certain SEO benefits, that is, by being listed on one or more of their directories you’ll see your own website’s rankings in the search engines improve.

All of DeclareMedia’s directories have two options for listings; free and paid. All listings provide the SEO benefits mentioned above, but featured listings show up on the homepage or state-level page of each directory, and therefore tend to drive more traffic and phone calls.
